sentences.english: A whole valley of boulders tossed higgledy-piggledy as though by some giant .
sentences.chinese: 整個山谷裏巨石翻滾，就像有巨人在狂扔亂擲。

sentences.english: The Stonehenge rite was a local staple for many decades.
sentences.chinese: 幾十年來，巨石陣儀式都是當地的一項主要活動。

sentences.english: Stonehenge is perhaps the most astounding construct of pre-history still standing.
sentences.chinese: 巨石陣也許是遺存至今最令人感到神祕的史前建築。

sentences.english: Stonehenge is one of the world's best preserved pre-historic monuments.
sentences.chinese: 巨石陣是世界上保存最好的史前遺址之一。

sentences.english: I lurks in the hearts of an abyss, also dropped boulder payment of voices.
sentences.chinese: 在我的心裏潛伏着一個深淵，扔下巨石也發不出聲音。

sentences.english: Newgrange has some of the finest megalithic art in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 新莊園擁有歐洲最好的一些巨石藝術。

sentences.english: Feng dance main, arrive megalith mountain scope, do you then want to quit?
sentences.chinese: 鳳舞法師，到達巨石山脈，你便要離開嗎？

sentences.english: There are a lot of megalithic stones in Clayonag.
sentences.chinese: 那裏有很多的巨石建築。

sentences.english: Near the megalithic stones is a hill.
sentences.chinese: 這些巨石建築物的附近有一座小山。

sentences.english: Some of the king's wealthiest merchants and courtiers came by and simply walked around it.
sentences.chinese: 一些最有錢的商人和侍臣經過，他們只是繞過巨石。

sentences.english: People call the broken rock Sword-power-test Rock.
sentences.chinese: 後人便把這塊斷裂成三塊的巨石叫“試劍石”。

sentences.english: Then he hid himself and watched to see if anyone would remove the huge rock.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他藏起來，看是否有人會挪開巨石。

sentences.english: Monolith, The Face of Half Dome, Yosemite National Park, 1927
sentences.chinese: 巨石，半圓山的容姿，約塞米蒂國家公園1927。

sentences.english: The first work was to move a big rock.
sentences.chinese: 首先的任務是移開一塊巨石。

sentences.english: Right now, more than 95% of China Fiberglass's incomes come from Jushi Group.
sentences.chinese: 目前，中國玻纖95%以上的收入都來自於巨石集團。

sentences.english: I would probably die out there amid those boulders.
sentences.chinese: 我很可能會在那些巨石中丟了性命。
